attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown and his cabinet continue to tax the British public to extortionate levels. He has let fuel prices get out of control. He continues to propose higher road tax levels for our cars and uses the environment as the reason. The health service is in ruins, our schools are failing and our emergency services get treated poorly. Time for him to go!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
